# Td Group Add
<!--
@name: Td Group Add
@description: Create an object of type "Group" and add it to the Parent object.
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->

<b>Syntax</b>
```basic
Td Group Add "my_group", ParentName$="scene"
```

Create an object of type "Group" and add it to the Parent object.
## Parameters

- **ObjectName&dollar;**: Name of the "Group" object that will be created
- **ParentName&dollar;**: Name of the object to which this "Group" object will be added.
---
